songs.title: Use Somebody
songs.lyrics:
[Zayn, Liam & Louis]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh

[Verse 1: Harry]
I've been roaming around
Always looking down in all I see
Painted faces fill the places I can't reach
You know that I could use somebody, yeah
You know that I could use somebody, yeah-yeah-yeah

[Verse 2: Louis]
Someone like you, and all you know, and how you speak
Countless lovers undercover on the streets
You know that I could use somebody, yeah
You know that I could use somebody, yeah-yeah

[Chorus: Louis & All]
Someone like you
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh

[Verse 3: Niall]
Off in the night while you live it up, I'm off to sleep
Waging wars to shape the poet and the beat
Well I hope it's going to make you notice
Well I hope it's going to make you notice

[Chorus: Zayn & All]
Someone like me
(Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
Someone like me, yeah
(Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
Someone like me, somebody, yeah
(Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)

[Bridge: Liam & All]
I'm ready now, I'm ready now
I'm ready now, I'm ready now
I'm ready now, I'm ready now
I'm ready now, I'm ready now

[Chorus: All & Harry]
(Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
Someone like you, somebody
(Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
Someone like you, somebody
(Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
Someone like you, somebody
(Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)

[End: Harry]
I've been roaming around, always looking down in all I see
